name: Watch Where You're Going
description:
Controls - Arrow keys to move, and left mouse click to attack.

Special feature - Traverse sequencer. Using the travel history panel, keep track of which directions you've moved in. There's a hidden sequence that you can complete, which will reward you handsomely!

Note:  Use a standard 16:9 monitor when running the game. The game's UI has not been tested and optimized for ultrawide/3:4 displays. 

Note 2: The Mac build also faces the same situation, so you might see some scaling issues. Please use the Windows build to enjoy the full experience!
